Its not because its a UserControl, as I've got that working, I can pick any LayoutAlgorithmType (obviously some don't work though (as in they don't produce a nice layout))

Do you have a  YourGraphLayout : GraphLayout<YourVertex, YourEdge, YourGraph> class? and that's what's added to the UserControl?

I needed a LayoutMode="Automatic" property set before it would do anything though, and I couldn't get the switching of layouts on the fly to work.
